title: Jukebox Tools
desc: I created the popular web application that offers a suite of tools for jukebox enthusiasts, including a title strip generator, layout studio, and record collection manager.

title: Old Boot Woodshop
desc: Woodworking is a passion of mine, and as an expression of that passion, I designed and developed a website to showcase my woodworking creations.

title: Select-O-Matic 100 Simulator
desc: I built a web application that faithfully simulates the functionality and experience of a 1952 Seeburg Select-O-Matic 100 jukebox. Go ahead... Drop a quarter!

title: NGCart
desc: I developed NGCart, a popular Angular component that eventually led to a book deal focused on this product.

title: Garage Door Opener
desc: Using a Raspberry Pi, I developed a garage door opener controllable via a web interface, with integration for Google Home and SMS alerts.

title: Lost In Thought
desc: Merging my passions for making and engineering, I created an interactive Halloween experience that combined AI, web sockets, and illusion.

title: intelli.gift
desc: A now-defunct AI experimentation project aimed at using artificial intelligence to curate ideal gift selections.
